oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Personnel Management Subcommittee Meeting Minutes, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Personnel Management Subcommittee, headed by Chairman Bobby Reynolds, met regularly between February and May of 1980. The subcommittee expressed the need for a Personnel Management Board. Under consolidation, the Personnel Management Board would be responsible for all personnel matters.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Civil service--Personnel management; Meetings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
